text: Visací zámek () is a Czech punk rock band. The band was formed in 1982. This band is thought to be the oldest Czech punk band. Its early work influenced the sound of an entire generation of bands. The early works of Visací zámek are strongly influenced by early nihilism and post-modernism. == Band members == * Jan "Hony" Haubert – vocals * Michal "Pixies" Pixa – kytara, vocals * Vladimír "Savec" Šťástka – bass guitar * Ivan "Hroch" Rut – kytara, vocals * Jiří "Sweet P" Pátek – drums == Discography == === Albums === * Visací zámek (1990) * Start 02 (1991) * Three Locks (1992) * Traktor (1993) * Jako vždycky (1994) * Sex (1996) * Visací zámek znovu zasahuje (2000) * Punk! (2005) * Klasika (2010) === Compilations and live records === * Raritky (1989) * Zámkománie (1998) * 19 let – Live at Akropolis (2001) * Žofín (2002) * 20 let – Live at Akropolis (2003) * Visací zámek 25 let (2008, CD + DVD) * Beat hall of fame (Live-Split-CD with Tři sestry, Fanánek and Synové výčepu) (2009) Category:punk bands Category:Czech musical groups
title: Visací zámek
